speaker: Welcome Panel
session: Doors Open; Coffee/Tea; Distribute customer swag

speaker: Karl Funk
message: Live demonstration showing a Banking Application with a central database for ledger management. We will show how the central database can survive an Availability Zone or even a Region failure. We then extend the use case to include a Fraud detection system that processes near real time transactions from the Banking Application database.

speaker: Dave Roberts Doug Hadfield
session: Session 2: Stopping the sky falling in? Building and operating clusters for resilience

speaker: Dai Clegg David Walker Alan Caldera
